title: Lagg spike issues
body:
Since yesterday in each game I play I am experiencing lagg spikes. This wouldnt be so weird if my ping is bad, but it isnt, its on 39-50 every single second. FPS is also great (170-190) 

So, does anyone know how to fix this?

          Thanks!

replies.body: Can you clarify what you mean by "lag spikes"? *Lag* is often used as a catch-all term that can mean different things to different people, so providing a few more details can help me help you. ^.^

It usually happens when I confront  champion or minions. When I press spell button game freezes for a sec and when it unfreezes my spell is on cd, I have lees HP, minions are dead... It looks like I didnt saw a few seconds of game.

What you're describing is a fairly common symptom of issues with *Packet Loss* or high packet buffering. These issues will occur if there's something wrong between your PC and our servers. Before we look into your network routing, it would be awesome if you could work through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues), as it will ensure all your local network settings are most compatible with League.

Hit me up if you continue to see issues after taking those steps.

I have the same issue.  I don't drop in frames nor does my ping spike upward but my champ sometimes just won't respond to my commands.  My character will just stop responding and I watch as other champions mow me down while I just stand still.  It'll fix itself after a few seconds but it still makes the game go in favor for the other team quite often.  Whenever I click it shows the animation from my cursor but my champion just won't move.  I don't know what to do to fix this.

I just installed the game again and every single match has been like this.  Spell was cast in top lane?  Lag.  I try to attack a minion?  Lag.  I don't want to hear "connection guide" because it has nothing to do with my internet.  Dota 2?  Perfect.  Elder Scrolls Legends?  Amazing.  Browser?  Excellent.  League of Legends?  Lag spikes since I installed it (again).

I tried capping my framerate since I heard that can be an issue but no change.
